Text: Transwestern Cc Lorraine It was a pleasure to meet you yesterday and hear about your pipeline project As promised I am sending you the name and number of the person that knows the other company here in Dallas that was looking at a site in the Gila Bend area I am also including the coordinates of our site so you can let us know if it is feasible to come to our plant I would appreciate it if you could let me know as soon as you can what that cost would be so we can run our economics on it David Livingston Cinergy UTM coordinates N E Thanks Beth
Proformas Cc Kim Attached are the proformas for our El Dorado AK and Gila River plants If you need anything else please give me a call Beth El Doradoproformaxls GilaRiveproformaxls

RE Proformas Cc Kim I am waiting on an answer from our legal dept They were making a minor change to the special provisions I will send to you as soon as I get the approval from them Beth AM Thanks Beth Credit will review and I will let you know if he has any questions I think the next thing we were waiting on were your new contracts If you guys need anything while we are waiting on those please let me know Also if we need to meet in person once we get things rolling we are available to come to Dallas Thanks Kim Original Message From Beth Conrad ENRON Sent Tuesday October AM To Ward Kim S Houston Cc Jim Adams Subject Proformas Kim Attached are the proformas for our El Dorado AK and Gila River plants If you need anything else please give me a call Beth El Doradoproformaxls File El Doradoproformaxls GilaRiveproformaxls File GilaRiveproformaxls This email is the property of Enron Corp andor its relevant affiliate and may contain confidential and privileged material for the sole use of the intended recipient s Any review use distribution or disclosure by others is strictly prohibited If you are not the intended recipient or authorized to receive for the recipient please contact the sender or reply to Enron Corp at and delete all copies of the message This email and any attachments hereto are not intended to be an offer or an acceptance and do not create or evidence a binding and enforceable contract between Enron Corp or any of its affiliates and the intended recipient or any other party and may not be relied on by anyone as the basis of a contract by estoppel or otherwise Thank you
